Contacts API

Get a contact

GET

/

public

/

api

/

v1

/

inboxes

/

{inbox\_identifier}

/

contacts

/

{contact\_identifier}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier}
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "source_id": "<string>",
  "name": "<string>",
  "email": "<string>",
  "pubsub_token": "<string>"
}
```

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#response-id)

id

integer

Id of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

The session identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#response-name)

name

string

Name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#response-email)

email

string

Email of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts-api/get-a-contact#response-pubsub-token)

pubsub\_token

string

The token to be used to connect to chatwoot websocket
